    • reload

      public void reload(String name, IFileProvider provider)
      Reloads or loads the asset by the specified name and FileProvider.

      You shouldn't call create() before reload().

      If you do that, and if there are 1000 textures, that means you created 2000 texture ids!

      指定者:
      reload 在类中 Asset
      参数:
      name - The asset name or alias.
      provider - The file provider.
